title: Impress the Murder Tribunal
content:
Impress the Murder Tribunal Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Fraygo's Flophouse Reward __reward__

Impress the Murder Tribunal

Impress the Murder Tribunal is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Impress the Murder Tribunal can be acquired during Act 3 and it is a branching subquest for the main questline Get Orin's Netherstone. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3 and earn more loot and experience to become more powerful.
